app.title: The Cake is a Lie
app.contentA: Check out all these mini-games! They're from my regular collection of open-source code sites.
app.contentB: You can view them in full screen by middle-clicking the game, opening it in a new window, and pressing F11.
app.contentC: Looking for additional features, a prettier interface, and a wider selection of mini-games? Visit the Github page!
